name: Easy Odd One Out 2 Trivia Quiz | Odd One Out | 10 Questions

questions.text: As it is an article of clothing, which of the following does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Camisole.

	Camisole is an article of clothing. All the rest are bed coverings.

questions.text: Of the following which is not a common flower?
questions.explanation:
Lucifer.

	Lucifer is another name for the Devil.

questions.text: All of the following are poets except?
questions.explanation:
Heifetz.

	Julie Heifetz was an author who wrote a biography entitled 'Too Young To Remember'.

questions.text: Which of the following does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Shark.

	The remaining three are mammals, whereas the shark is a fish.

questions.text: All of the following were men's colleges in the forties except?
questions.explanation:
Vassar.

	Vassar is a coed college founded in 1861. It was a women's college until the late '60s.

questions.text: Pick out the one that is NOT used for water transportation.
questions.explanation:
Jinrikisha.

	It is a two wheeled land vehicle.

questions.text: Which of the following does not belong?
questions.explanation:
mango.

	All the others are citrus fruits.

questions.text: All of the following are crustaceans except?
questions.explanation:
Jellyfish.

	The jellyfish has no shell.

questions.text: Which of the following does not belong to the spectrum?
questions.explanation:
Pink.

	Pink is not a color of the spectrum.

questions.text: All of the following are bones except?
questions.explanation:
Miasma.

	Miasma is a polluting exhalation.
